verbs.description: plans for new premier health facility in beavercreek [V: move] [ARGM-DIR: forward] premier health plans for a new primary care facility in beavercreek are moving forward cincinnati - based contractor al neyer was issued a building permit valued at 7 23 million for a 46 000-square - foot facility on lakeview drive beavercreek city officials confirmed the permit is intended for the construction of a premier health primary care office the dayton business journal reported last month the hospital network plans to open two premier health lakeview drive beavercreek township greene county ohio beavercreek neyer beavercreek ohio dayton business journal
